html:
have you taken a break recently? here are a couple of the hand/wrist stretches I do regularly, especially while I’m drawing or if I’ve been on my phone or computer for a while. remember that overexertion is a career-killer! be mindful of your work time & listen to your body. pic.twitter.com/mDCiCrKLIA

— kaitlin ✨ (@bruderkaitlin) May 17, 2018
